examples.text: ? Take off your hahaha .. Nothing just chillin
[ The Lurkers Haven ] Just Chillin A Tid of Grinding [ Bearded Edition ]

senses.synonym: relax: become less tense, rest, or take one's ease; 'He relaxed in the hot tub'; 'Let's all relax after a hard day's work' <i21894>

relations.target: chill: make cool or cooler; 'Chill the food' <i23586>
